summary.body: Hi again, Yet another tradesman request. Does anyone know of a someone who cold potentially paint a, but also sand, and revarnish the sliding door balcony on a barbican studio flat? It would be great to see it restored to its original glory. Thanks Max
summary.subject: painter, window frame person

summary.body: Can anyone recommend a reliable painter and decorator for just a small job (double height ceiling in a duplex)?
summary.subject: PAINTER & DECORATOR
